products.contentOne: Fall in love with a new kind of matte. The creamy, whipped texture hugs lips with intense color in one precise swipe. This unique formula leaves lips feeling plush and comfy and not dry.
products.contentTwo: Forget the fine lines and dryness of the past—get luxe and whipped liquid color in rich, head-turning hues that won’t suck the life outta your lips.

products.contentOne: Splash on this lip stain that goes on glossy and leaves behind a soft tint—delivering instant hydration for an effortless, low-maintenance look.
products.contentTwo: This is the lip stain that just hits different—giving you juicy, all-day hydration. This lip tint formula features an oil-in-water innovation with squalene, in a range of vibrant shades.
